instruction: Describe the contribution of scientists in the field of medicine.
output: Scientists have played a major role in the development of modern medicine, from pre-clinical research to clinical trials. They have contributed in a variety of ways, from discovering new treatments, to developing diagnostic tools and techniques, to finding new drug delivery systems. Scientists have uncovered the underlying causes of many diseases and medical conditions, and have helped to develop new treatments and preventive measures. By advancing our understanding of medicine, scientists are helping to improve the quality of life for people around the world.
